data.text: @DanDistrict7 Steve definitely was/is a champion for the children of Nashville, the ones all the smart set left behind and lost like  @buggsforschools @elrodforschools  etc. etc. etc.
@DanDistrict7 Steve Glover has stood with parents from the beginning. He even came to our first Reopen rally, in the rain, back in August 2020.

@DanDistrict7 I have kept a comprehensive list of all of the other local elected officials who advocated for a swift reopening of schools. Here it is:

1. Fran Bush
